name: PushyPixels
description:
A game made in a retro themed game Jam by me and three cool dudes.

Me
https://github.com/DavSchwartz

Terrance
https://itch.io/profile/hanlo053umnedu
https://github.com/terrancehanlon

Jake
https://itch.io/profile/mochamadness
 https://github.com/jacob-oreilly

Jordan
https://github.com/jordan-krill/PushyPixels


Controls

Player 1
    w = up
    a = left
    s = down
    d = right
    q = punch
    
    
Player 2
    i = up
    j = left
    k = down
    l = right
    u = punch

Player 3
    up = up
    left = left
    down = down
    right = right
    rctrl = punch

Player 4
    numPad8 = up
    numPad4 = left
    numPad5 = down
    numPad6 = right
    numPad0 = punch
